languages.text: "Это долгий процесс. Полагаю, такой же долгий, как и возвращение к вашему привычному фальшивому лексикону... шерин Джай".
"It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."
languages.original_text: "Это долгий процесс. Полагаю, такой же долгий, как и возвращение к вашему привычному фальшивому лексикону... шерин Джай".

traits.locale_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “恢复的过程可长着呢。我确实可以设法掩饰虚弱，但我的演技可不像你这么娴熟……亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: “恢复的过程可长着呢。我确实可以设法掩饰虚弱，但我的演技可不像你这么娴熟……亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est un long processus. J'imagine que je pourrais essayer de cacher mon infirmité, mais mes talents d'acteur sont bien loin d'égaler les vôtres... shereen. »
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un long processus. J'imagine que je pourrais essayer de cacher mon infirmité, mais mes talents d'actrice sont bien loin d'égaler les vôtres... shereen. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Es un proceso largo. Supongo que podría intentar ocultar mi estado, pero no soy tan buena actriz como usted... shereen».
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Es un proceso largo. Supongo que podría intentar ocultar mi estado, pero no soy tan buena actriz como usted... shereen».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「先は長いんだ。そっちみたいに本当は弱っていることを隠そうとしてもいいが、こっちは大した役者じゃないんだよ…シェリーン」
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「先は長いんだ。アタシは弱ってるのを隠そうとすればできるだろうけど、アンタほどのベテラン役者じゃないんだよ…ダーリン」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist ein langwieriger Prozess. Ich könnte wohl versuchen, mein Gebrechen zu verbergen, doch ich habe nicht Euer schauspielerisches Talent ... Shereen."
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein langwieriger Prozess. Ich könnte wohl versuchen, mein Gebrechen zu verbergen, doch ich habe nicht Euer schauspielerisches Talent ... Shereen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

languages.text: "Uzun bir süreç bu. Güçsüzlüğümü gizlemeye çalışabilirim sanırım ama ben senin kadar başarılı bir oyuncu değilim... Şirinim."
languages.original_text: "It is a long process. I could try to hide my infirmity, I suppose, but I am not as accomplished an actor as you are... shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Uzun bir süreç bu. Güçsüzlüğümü gizlemeye çalışabilirim sanırım ama ben senin kadar başarılı bir oyuncu değilim... Şirinim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
